SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

matrix.db
Class Access

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--matrix.db.AccessConstants
        |
        +--matrix.db.Access
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Access
extends AccessConstants
implements java.io.Serializable

The eMatrix Access class represents the current access rights for a User. The access rights can be for the User in general or the User's access rights to a specific BusinessObject based on it's current state.

See Also:
BusinessObject.getAccessMask(), Person.getAccessMask(), Serialized Form

Fields inherited from class matrix.db.AccessConstants
accessToFlag, cAll, cChangeLattice, cChangeName, cChangeOwner, cChangePolicy, cChangeType, cChangeVault, cCheckin, cCheckout, cCreate, cDelete, cDemote, cDisable, cEnable, cExecute, cFreeze, cFromConnect, cFromDisconnect, cGrant, cLock, cModify, cModifyForm, cNone, cOverride, cPromote, cRead, cRevise, cRevoke, cSchedule, cShow, cThaw, cToConnect, cToDisconnect, cUnLock, cViewForm

has

public boolean has(int acc)
            throws MatrixException
Check for a specific access
Parameters:
acc - an integer representation of the Access to check.
Returns:
boolean whether or not a user has this acccess.
Throws:
MatrixException - when acc is outside the array bounds.
Since:
ADK 9.1.0

processIntList

public void processIntList(IntList accessList)
                    throws MatrixException
Process a list of access rights
Parameters:
accessList - the accesses to set to true, i.e. cRead, cDelete, etc.
Since:
ADK 9.1.0
